name: Pixel Maze (itch)
description:
One pixel. No sounds. And mazes. ¿Can you complete the challenge?

Controls

  • Up key - try to move forward
  • Left key - turn left
  • Right key - turn right
  • Numbers (1, 2, 3 and 4) - change the map

Manual

All game is in two colors, green and red. Red color indicates the action taken.

  • One short blink - move forward successful
  • Two short blinks - collide with a wall
  • One long blink - turn left or right
  • Definitive change to red - you have completed the level
